body.name: Hendrix 4-in-1 Convertible Crib, Greenguard Gold Certified, Midnight Grey/Bronze
features: THE SAFEST OPTION FOR YOUR BABY: This crib is JPMA certified to meet or exceed all safety standards set by the CPSC & ASTM | We know chemicals have no place in your nursery, so we use a non-toxic multi-step painting process that is lead and phthalate safe
4-IN-1 CONVERTIBLE CRIB: Converts to a toddler bed, daybed and sofa (Daybed/Sofa Rail included; Toddler Guardrail #0094 sold separately) | Crib features a metal base in a bronze color
ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT: Adjustable height mattress support with 3 convenient positions to grow with your baby

COORDINATING ITEMS: Uses a standard size crib mattress (sold separately) | To ensure the perfect fit pair your crib with a Delta Children, Serta, Beautyrest or Simmons Kids crib mattress | Add the Delta Children Under Crib Storage Drawer #W100950-130 for extra storage

QUALITY MATERIAL: Made of sustainable New Zealand pine wood and TSCA compliant engineered wood | Tested for lead and other toxic elements to meet or exceed government and ASTM safety standards | SIZE: Assembled dimensions: 54"L x 30.50"D x 35.25"H| Easy to assemble

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hendrix 4-in-1 Convertible Crib Hendrix 3 Drawer Dresser Changing Top #W100710

Shake things up in your nursery with the mixed material design of the Hendrix 4-in-1 Convertible Baby Crib by Delta Children. The pine wood construction brings warmth while the shiny bronze legs add a modern, rock and roll flair. Designed to accommodate your growing child, this crib features a three-position adjustable mattress support. Set the mattress at the highest height for your newborn baby, and lower when they begin to sit or stand. And thanks to an easy-to-use Toddler Guardrail #0094 (sold separately), this crib isn’t just a bronze beauty, it’s the only bed your little one will need. Transform it into a toddler bed when the time is right, and then to a stylish daybed when they’re ready for a little more independence. Underneath the crib there’s enough space to fit the coordinating Under Crib Roll-Out Storage Unit #W100950-130 Bianca White or #W100950-1360 Midnight (sold separately). Delta Children was founded around the idea of making safe, high-quality cribs affordable for all families. That's why all Delta Children cribs are JPMA certified, and are tested above and beyond industry standards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Love this dresser! It’s very sturdy and I really like the color. Great hardy material and fits great in my son’s “big boy” room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap, Horrible, and Horrid!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This was by far one of the worst purchases I’ve made on Amazon. The quality was HORRIBLE. Directly out of the box, there where blue streaks all throughout the paint, as if they used one coat of cheap white paint & the blue undertones were showing through. It was riddled with random holes and indentations, some of which were attempted to be painted over. Where each beam met the bases (shown in video) there were scrapes, holes, and chips missing as if the holes created for them to fit in were too big and/or just shoved in. There was also this yellowish colored gunk (possibly glue residue?) all around the holes….every hole lol there were random holes on the front and back sides of each piece. I waited for this crib to come and was very much looking forward to it, and was met by this tragedy. I’m 9months pregnant w/ a due date in just weeks. I immediately started crying when I saw this. I was hoping that it was just issues that would be hidden on the inside, but no. I didn’t even put assembly it of course. I reached out to customer service for a replacement to get it here asap, one that was hopefully in better condition, but that wasn’t an option so I had to go with my original crib, which fortunately is back in stock. It smelled as cheap as it looked. Like cheap wooden scraps. Overall, it was full of defects and the appearance was trash. The paint was done so poorly and the quality of the wood seemed even worse. I can’t believe this is something that was sent out confidently. I wouldn’t recommend this to even a dog!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Modern Sturdy Crib
reviews.reviewText: It’s not black that’s for sure it’s more of a midnight navy blue. I like that it is sturdy with a modern touch, building it was easy got it together with my husband in 30 min, now if you hate building stuff it is a bit more complex than other cribs. I love the legs they are heavy and sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Overall, this would have been the perfect dresser, except the bottom drawer came with a terrible track. You have to use serious muscle to open and close the drawer, which will be very annoying once I have a baby in my arms. I called the customer service line on the insert and couldn’t get anyone on the phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I don’t typically write reviews but I had to for this dresser because I am utterly disappointed at the poor quality of this item. It came with numerous defective parts that made it impossible for my husband and I to assemble the dresser. This item was far too expensive for there to be this many issues. Do not buy this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Sinks!! Of chemical
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to give this product 0 stars. Don’t invite toxic chemicals into your home find another crib that is green guard certified most of delta cribs sink of paint.
